    • Method Detail

      • isOnATeam

        public java.lang.Boolean isOnATeam(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Checks if the player is on a team. Use isOnTeam(UUID, Team) to check if the player is on a specific team.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player to check.
        Returns:
        true if on a team, else false.

      • isOnTeam

        public java.lang.Boolean isOnTeam(java.util.UUID uuid,
                         Team team)
        Checks if the player is on the specified team. Use isOnATeam(UUID) to check if the player is on any team.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player.
        team - The team to check.
        Returns:
        true if they are on that team, else false.

        Sets up the teams for the arena.
        Parameters:
        minTeamCount - The minimum amount of teams for the arena.
        maxTeamCount - The maximum amount of teams for the arena.
        playerCount - The current player count.

      • removePlayerFromTeam

        public void removePlayerFromTeam(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Removes the specified player from their team. Should only be used when a player quits/is out the minigame or leaves the server.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player.
